Text: Keyspan Energy Deliveries January Enrollment Deadlines Cc advised that the KeySpan Energy Delivery Companies deadline for January drops is Friday December at PM NY time and the deadline for enrollments is Wednesday December at PM NY time We are moving up the enrollment deadline by one day due to the holidays The enrollment deadline applies to the INTERRUPTIBLE as well as the FIRM accounts for Long Island This change is necessary to be able to populate the Electronic Bulletin Board EBB with the correct data We strongly recommend that you process your transactions as well in advance of these deadlines as possible Key Span will not accept any transaction beyond these dates and times Transactions that are rejected and resubmitted subsequent to the deadline dates and times will not be accepted Your cooperation in complying with this request is greatly appreciated Thank You KeySpan Energy Delivery
Gas Delivery Alert Cc the attached notice NOTICE TO ALL MARKETERSdoc

Firm and Interruptible December Deadlinesbe advised that the KeySpan Energy Delivery Companies deadline for December drops is Wednesday November at PM NY time and the deadline for enrollments is Monday November at PM NY time The enrollment deadline applies to the INTERRUPTIBLE as well as the FIRM accounts for Long Island This change is necessary to be able to populate the Electronic Bulletin Board EBB with the correct data We strongly recommend that you process your transactions as well in advance of these deadlines as possible Key Span will not accept any transaction beyond these dates and times Transactions that are rejected and resubmitted subsequent to the deadline dates and times will not be accepted Your cooperation in compiling with this request is greatly appreciated Thank You KeySpan Energy Delivery
